# A Brief Introduction of myself

![](Yuqing Xue.jpg)) 

My name is Yuqing Xue, a second-year MPH student at Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health Department of Epidemiology with a certificate of Applied Biostatistics. I am currently working as a research assistant for Injury Epidemiology research. My job function is data cleaning and statistical programming. I am also the teaching assistant for Research Methods and Application studio, teaching for Quant Labs. I graduated from Peking University in 2018 where I studied Pharmaceutical Sciences and had a double major in Economis.I am currently seeking job postions in counsulting firms or data analyst postion in healthcare industry.
